name: Mad Bat
description:
Simple free-time made game. Follows the Angry Birds concept. Game contains 6 levels (early access) but would be adding more. Controls are:
Hold & Drag mouse = Draw the bird
Let Go of Click = Launch the bird
Tab = Pause

Links to help, textures...:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX_b3NNQN5bzExm-22-NVVg , 
https://opengameart.org/users/bevouliincom
Sound icon by Icons8
https://www.bensound.com/

Let me know if you want more levels, as well as notify me on bugs and glitches
Enjoy
